   16: 
   17: -module(shared_roster_SUITE).
   18: -compile(export_all).
   19: 
   20: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   21: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus_xmlns.hrl").
   22: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   23: -include_lib("exml/include/exml.hrl").
   24: 
   25: -define(USERS, {by_name, [alice, bob]}).
   26: 
   27: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   28: %% Suite configuration
   29: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   30: all() ->
   31: 
   32:     [{group, shared_roster}].
   33: 
   34: groups() ->
   35:     [{shared_roster,[sequence],[receive_presences,get_contacts,delete_user,add_user]}].
   36: 
   37: 
   38: 
   39: suite() ->
   40:     escalus:suite().
   41: 
   42: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   43: %% Init & teardown
   44: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   45: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   46:     case get_auth_method() of
   47:         ldap ->
   48:             start_roster_module(ldap),
   49:             escalus:init_per_suite([{escalus_user_db, {module, ldap_helper}}, {ldap_auth, true} | Config]);
   50:         _ ->
   51:             escalus:init_per_suite([{ldap_auth, false} | Config])
   52:     end.
   53: 
   54: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   55:     stop_roster_module(get_auth_method()),
   56:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config).
   57: 
   58: init_per_group(_, Config) ->
   59:     escalus:create_users(Config, ?USERS).
   60: 
   61: end_per_group(_, Config) ->
   62:     escalus:delete_users(Config, ?USERS).
   63: 
   64: init_per_testcase(CaseName,Config) ->
   65:     case proplists:get_value(ldap_auth, Config) of
   66:         false ->
   67:             {skip, no_shared_roster_available};
   68:         _ ->
   69:             escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName,Config)
   70:     end.
   71: 
   72: end_per_testcase(CaseName,Config) ->
   73:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName,Config).
   74: 
   75: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   76: %% Tests
   77: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   78: 
   79: %% Receive presences from roster people
   80: receive_presences(Config) ->
   81:     escalus:story(Config,[{alice, 1}],fun(Alice) ->
   82:         % Bob becomes available
   83:         {ok, Bob} = escalus_client:start_for(Config, bob, <<"res1">>),
   84:         escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
   85: 
   86:         % Alice receives presence from Bob
   87:         ReceivedA = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
   88:         escalus:assert(is_presence,ReceivedA),
   89:         escalus_assert:is_stanza_from(Bob,ReceivedA),
   90: 
   91:         no_stanzas([Alice]),
   92:         escalus_client:stop(Bob)
   93:     end).
   94: 
   95: get_contacts(Config) ->
   96:     escalus:story(Config,[{alice, 1}],fun(Alice) ->
   97:         % Alice sends get_roster iq
   98:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:roster_get()),
   99:         Roster=escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  100: 
  101:         % Roster contains all created users excluding Alice
  102:         escalus:assert(is_roster_result,Roster),
  103:         NumOfOtherUsers = length(escalus_users:get_users(?USERS))-1,
  104:         escalus:assert(count_roster_items,[NumOfOtherUsers],Roster)
  105:     end).
  106: 
  107: delete_user(Config) ->
  108:     NumOfOtherUsers = length(escalus_users:get_users(?USERS))-2,
  109:     %% wait to invalidate the roster group cache
  110:     timer:sleep(1200),
  111:     escalus_users:delete_users(Config,{by_name, [bob]}),
  112:     escalus:story(Config,[{alice, 1}],fun(Alice) ->
  113:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:roster_get()),
  114:         Roster=escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  115: 
  116:         escalus:assert(is_roster_result,Roster),
  117:         escalus:assert(count_roster_items,[NumOfOtherUsers],Roster)
  118:     end).
  119: 
  120: add_user(Config) ->
  121:     escalus_users:create_users(Config,{by_name, [bob]}),
  122:     timer:sleep(1200),
  123:     escalus:story(Config,[{alice, 1}],fun(Alice) ->
  124:         NumOfOtherUsers = length(escalus_users:get_users(?USERS))-1,
  125: 
  126:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:roster_get()),
  127:         Roster=escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  128: 
  129:         escalus:assert(is_roster_result,Roster),
  130:         escalus:assert(count_roster_items,[NumOfOtherUsers],Roster)
  131:     end).
  132: 
  133: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  134: %% Helpers
  135: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  136: start_roster_module(ldap) ->
  137:     case escalus_ejabberd:rpc(gen_mod, start_module,
  138:                               [ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
  139:                                mod_shared_roster_ldap, get_ldap_args()]) of
  140:         {badrpc, Reason} ->
  141:             ct:fail("Cannot start module ~p reason ~p", [mod_shared_roster, Reason]);
  142:         _ -> ok
  143:     end;
  144: start_roster_module(_) ->
  145:     ok.
  146: 
  147: stop_roster_module(ldap)->
  148:     case escalus_ejabberd:rpc(gen_mod, stop_module, [ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain), mod_shared_roster_ldap]) of
  149:         {badrpc, Reason} ->
  150:             ct:fail("Cannot stop module ~p reason ~p", [mod_shared_roster_ldap, Reason]);
  151:         _ -> ok
  152:     end;
  153: stop_roster_module(_)->
  154:     ok.
  155: 
  156: get_auth_method() ->
  157:     XMPPDomain = ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
  158:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_config, get_local_option,[{auth_method, XMPPDomain}]).
  159: 
  160: get_ldap_args() ->
  161:     [
  162:      {ldap_base, "ou=Users,dc=esl,dc=com"},
  163:      {ldap_groupattr, "ou"},
  164:      {ldap_memberattr, "cn"},{ldap_userdesc, "cn"},
  165:      {ldap_filter, "(objectClass=inetOrgPerson)"},
  166:      {ldap_rfilter, "(objectClass=inetOrgPerson)"},
  167:      {ldap_group_cache_validity, 1},
  168:      {ldap_user_cache_validity, 1}
  169:     ].
  170: 
  171: no_stanzas(Users) ->
  172:     lists:foreach(fun escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas/1, Users).
